body: `FunctionSchema` already stores return types pre-flattened and would remove the need to do it here. This is another reason to parse get_annotation into `FunctionSchema` first.
body_html: FunctionSchema already stores return types pre-flattened and would remove the need to do it here. This is another reason to parse get_annotation into FunctionSchema first.
body_text: FunctionSchema already stores return types pre-flattened and would remove the need to do it here. This is another reason to parse get_annotation into FunctionSchema first.
